reviews.text: if you cannot find anywhere else to stay.
reviews.title: This should be your last choice...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The price is reasonable, the location is perfect since one can go anywhere on foot and the rooms are clean.
reviews.title: Birhtday party in Thessaloniki

reviews.text: BUT... the bathrooms do not have a proper door, the rooms have a smell which is a combination of mustiness and chlorine, the breakfast is poor and both employees and clients smoke in the reception area where it is forbidden.
reviews.title: Old/Dirty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not mind so much though because we did not have to spend anytime in the room.
reviews.title: Never come back here

reviews.text: We booked our stay in Mandrino via a Bulgarian travel agent. The price was ok for last minute. We bought our voucher just 2 days before we went there. The stuff was very friendy and they spoke good English. We arrived very early in the morning - 5 AM and they gave us the keys for the room - was nice to have a sleep before we started to explore the city. Is located in a very good place and the breakfast also was great. There is a little bit noise in the night because the hotel is located on a main boulevard.In general is good place and good price.
reviews.title: Loved the Mandrino
